players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Stay silent today."
You: "Will observe today, keeping an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Will observe, waiting for the detective to act."
Charlie: "Observing, waiting for Diana to act. Stay safe Bob."
You: "Noticing Diana's accusation, will stay alert. Charlie, keep low."
Diana: "Charlie, stay hidden. Bob and I will protect the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Stay silent today."
Bob: "Will observe today, keeping an eye on Charlie."
You: "Will observe, waiting for the detective to act."
You: "Observing, waiting for Diana to act. Stay safe Bob."
Bob: "Noticing Diana's accusation, will stay alert. Charlie, keep low."
Diana: "Charlie, stay hidden. Bob and I will protect the town."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Stay silent today."
Bob: "Will observe today, keeping an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Will observe, waiting for the detective to act."
Charlie: "Observing, waiting for Diana to act. Stay safe Bob."
Bob: "Noticing Diana's accusation, will stay alert. Charlie, keep low."
You: "Charlie, stay hidden. Bob and I will protect the town."
